name: Christmasday
0:
”Alexa, ask Christmas Day how long it is until Christmas”
”Alexa, ask Christmas Day when Santa will arrive”
”Alexa, ask Christmas Day how long is it until Santa gets here”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas day
des: This skill tells you how many days it is until Christmas Day, and informs an inquisitive audience when Santa will arrive. Uses Amazon's Alexa Presentation Language to display a Christmas themed image.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
